name: Alone In The Diner
description:
Controlls:
  • W/A/S/D to move
  • E to interact (doors, pickup items)
  • Right mouse button to focus (hold)
  • Left mouse button to take a picture (only possible when focused)
Known issues:
  • Menu button and text only visible while fullscreen
  • The Trailer is a placeholder
  • Black borders left and right are not intendet
  • The game is not scary at all
More games by NowKnown!

 

Assets used:  

Character Movement Fundamentals     by Jan Ott

FREE Lomo Camera by Monqo Studios

DINER by Edlunn03

Text Animator for Unity by Febucci Creations

Pixelation by Dmitry Timofeev

This game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2

Game by: Marvin Woelke / MAWO
